T02D3028:72a-0: @72a * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa @72b la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3028:72a-1: bran dang bza' mi bsrung bar 'dod pas sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas /
T02D3028:72a-2: dur khrod kyi shing leb kyi steng du dkyil 'khor bzhengs la khri'i steng du bzhag la /
T02D3028:72a-3: 'og tu chu'i snod chen po gzhag go //
T02D3028:72a-4: de'i shar du gang bsrung ba de rnams khrus nas bton la bzhag la ;
T02D3028:72a-5: tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la snying po brgya rtsa
T02D3028:72a-6: brgyad bzlas la mdud pa bor la mgul du gdags
T02D3028:72a-7: so // rgya shog la 'khor lo rtsibs lnga pa
T02D3028:72a-8: la shin tu bsdus pa'i 'khor lo gi wang gis
T02D3028:72a-9: so // bris la / spyi bo'i gtsug tu gdags so //
T02D3028:72a-10: shar du kha bltas la phyag btsal ba dang /
T02D3028:72a-11: de ltar lho dang nub dang byang rnams su phyag
T02D3028:72a-12: 'tshal du bcug la dkyil 'khor gyi 'og gi chus
T02D3028:72a-13: brab ba dang / brdeg pa dang /
T02D3028:72a-14: 'thor 'thung byas la dkyil 'khor gyi 'og nas shar
T02D3028:72a-15: nas nub tu bton cing ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil
T02D3028:72a-16: 'khor de 'od kyi phung po chen po zhi bar
T02D3028:72a-20: tshar gcad par 'dod na ljang gur bzhu /
T02D3028:72a-22: 'od zer de gang bsrung ba'i spyi gtsug tu bstims la /
T02D3028:72a-23: de nyid kyang 'od kyi kha dog ci 'dra bar bzhu bar dmigs la /
T02D3028:72a-24: phyogs skyong dang sgo ma rnams de nyid la mchod par dmigs so //
T02D3028:72a-25: de ltar byas pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi byin rlabs kyi gzhir 'gyur ro //
T02D3028:72a-26: bran dang bza' mi gdon gyis gtses pa bsrung ba'i cho ga chen mo zhes bya ba /
